cisc3120.chatter

Class ReceiverDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • cisc3120.chatter.ChatterReceiver
        • cisc3120.chatter.ReceiverDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ReceiverDecorator
extends ChatterReceiver
    Modifies ChatterReceiver to keep on receiving and displaying messages if the message ends with a specified pattern.
    Author:
    David
